articles.title: Moncton fertility clinic to expand, tackle waitlists under new owner
articles.description: The Fertility Partners took over Conceptia last week after months of outcry from patients who said they were left in the dark about their treatments. The company is vowing to expand the clinic and cut down on long waitlists.
